name: When Darkness Comes
description:
Precision Platformer inspired by Geometry Dash's obstacles. You're a cat named Jayden and you have to complete 15 levels, starting from baby difficulty to hard.

This is a game remake of my old game which was made in the Unity Engine. This remake is made in the Godot Engine.

For best performance, download the zip file, the html version might be a bit laggy.

Controls :
A - left
D - right
S - quickfall
W, Space - jump
